Source.Name: unibilium
Source.Description: Unibilium is a very basic terminfo library. It can read and write ncurses-style terminfo files. It doesn't depend on curses or any other library. It also doesn't use global variables, so it should be thread-safe.

Package.Name: unibilium
Package.Description: Unibilium is a very basic terminfo library. It can read and write ncurses-style terminfo files. It doesn't depend on curses or any other library. It also doesn't use global variables, so it should be thread-safe.
